DestinationTransitGatewayAttachmentId.description: The ID of the source attachment through which traffic leaves a transit gateway

SourcePortRange.description: The list of ports on source instances sending traffic to the transit gateway

PolicyRuleNumber.description: The rule number of the metering policy entry

DestinationTransitGatewayAttachmentType.description: The type of the attachment through which traffic leaves a transit gateway

DestinationCidrBlock.description: The list of IP addresses of the instances receiving traffic from the transit gateway

TransitGatewayMeteringPolicyId.description: The ID of the transit gateway metering policy for which the entry is being created

DestinationPortRange.description: The list of ports on destination instances receiving traffic from the transit gateway

MeteredAccount.description: The resource owner information responsible for paying default billable charges for the traffic flow

UpdateEffectiveAt.description: The timestamp at which the latest action performed on the metering policy entry will become effective

State.description: State of the transit gateway metering policy

SourceCidrBlock.description: The list of IP addresses of the instances sending traffic to the transit gateway for which the metering policy entry is applicable

SourceTransitGatewayAttachmentId.description: The ID of the source attachment through which traffic enters a transit gateway

SourceTransitGatewayAttachmentType.description: The type of the attachment through which traffic enters a  transit gateway
